# IBM Commerce Product UI Slider Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. This project adheres to
[Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/) and [Keep a CHANGELOG](http://keepachangelog.com/).

## [2.1.1](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/2.1.1) - 2016-06-25
### Fixed
- Levels of readiness for showcase

## [2.1.0](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/2.1.0) - 2016-06-02
### Added
- PrismJS to demo
- accessibility support
### Changed
- `package.json` to meet the standard devDependencies & acquire Gitlab url
- `gulpfile.js` to meet the standard format
- `README.md` to meet the new format
- updated demo files to meet latest standard
- restyled toggle switch view to meet latest spec

## [2.0.2](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/2.0.2) - 2016-04-05
### Fixed
- Slider as Toggle fixes to meet new look & feel style

## [2.0.1](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/2.0.1) - 2016-04-04
### Added
- x1-ui-ng-demo-generator to demo
### Changed
- demo structure for new showcase

## [2.0.0](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/2.0.0) - 2016-03-29
### Added
- IBM Commerce Product Design Language 2.0
### Changed
- Bower dependencies to meet new look & feel

## [1.0.0](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/1.0.0) - 2016-03-03
### Changed
- porting build environment to Node LTS 4.3.1 which requires updating dependency packages.
- Please update your build environment, remove node_modules directory, run npm install && npm update before using this version

## [0.1.3](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/0.1.3) - 2016-01-26
### Added
- Added + and - buttons to first demo in order to demonstrate slider movement on click of stepper buttons

## [0.1.2](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/0.1.2) - 2015-10-29
### Added
- Ability to change the connect property dynamically

## [0.1.1](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/0.1.1) - 2015-10-20
### Added
- Callback function which is triggered on handle drag

## [0.1.0](https://gitlabhost.rtp.raleigh.ibm.com/commerce-ui/x1-ui-ng-slider/tree/0.1.0) - 2015-10-16
### Added
- This component allows you to easily create a slider (with on handle), a range slider (with two handles) or a toggle.
